name: places/ChIJx9hQMBVZwokRvjc-AWmSup8
formattedAddress: 301 Columbus Ave, New York, NY 10023, USA
adrFormatAddress: 301 Columbus Ave, New York, NY 10023, USA

originalText.text: These cookies are simply amazing! You can make your order in one of the two screens available and then you wait for approximately 5 minutes to get cookie (they were still warm because they had just made them). Also, before ordering you can see real examples of the cookies so that you can better decide which one you want. We highly recommend this place!

originalText.text:
Had only seen the viral videos of Crumbl cookies on social media before coming and I was very doubtful that they were really as good as people said on the videos I watched.

Let me tell you, they are way better than I imagined!!
First of all, their store was sooo cool, they have like the cookie factory right there and while you make your order, you can also see the team making the cookie dough, mixing it, etc.

The ambiance was light, fresh and cool, and all the employees seemed like they were having such a great time!!! Loved it.

Their cookies were some of my favorite, we ordered a box of 4: sugar ft motherâ€™s circus animal, chocolate cake, kentucky butter cake and milk chocolate chip. They were all AMAZING. Perfectly made and all the right amounts of everything, they were not too sweet, not hard, not overly baked, it was just perfection!!!
The ultimate favorite was Kentucky butter cake, then followed the sugar ft motherâ€™s circus animal. I have discovered that Iâ€™m not a huge fan of chocolate cookies, so barely tried the chocolate ones, they were very good and my bf loved them, but canâ€™t really offer my unbiased opinion. Try them and decide for yourself!!

Canâ€™t wait to be back and try more flavors!!

originalText.text: I've worked in retail before so I don't like the fact that as I'm picking up my order at 5:00 p.m. there's only one person at the register or to be seen at all. It wasn't super busy in the store but this is New York City it gets busy really fast. Other than that, my cookies were soft moist and delicious I enjoyed every bite. And the young lady who helped me at the desk was lovely and very hospitable.

originalText.text: I love cookies, so big isnâ€™t a problem. These are too sweet. Iâ€™ve had over a dozen of the flavors hoping to find one Iâ€™ll like. Iâ€™ll eat the semi-sweet chocolate chip (not the milk chocolate) and lemon drop (I think?). 3 stars because my kids love it.

originalText.text: The place is chic and modern.  The cookies look fancy, and the taste is okay. The favorite was the lemon.   My kids said it's overhyped on social media.  Overall, I recommend trying. ðŸŒŸ
